Daughter and I had a super lunch last week, outdoors.  Warm service, waitresses couldn't have been nicer,  Really super food, I had the one of their daily lunch specials - it was just crazy, 3 courses for maybe 12-14€ (I can't recall), excellent food.   This is high-style food served in a more casual atmosphere and with great quality.   We are definitely fans - highly recommend for a great lunch, and it's around the corner from the Mercado de Santa Caterina if you have any room left.
